mapper.select: SELECT adminid FROM tb_admin WHERE 1=1 AND adminid = #{value }
mapper.sql: SELECT member_id, member_pw, member_name, TO_CHAR(birth,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS birth, gender, member_addr, nick, member_grade, point FROM tb_member

SELECT rownum rnum, B.* FROM (
ORDER BY member_id DESC ) B ORDER BY rnum
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tb_show ORDER BY show_id

SELECT show_id , show_division , show_genre , show_place , show_name
, show_rprice , show_sprice , show_time , show_lat , show_len , show_call , show_image , show_cast , show_age , show_host , show_sub , show_addr FROM tb_show WHERE show_id = #{show_id } ORDER BY show_id ASC
SELECT to_char(payment_date, 'YYYY') AS payment_date FROM tb_book GROUP BY to_char(payment_date, 'YYYY') ORDER BY payment_date ASC

SELECT show_genre ,SUM(decode(seat_grade,'S',1,0))+sum(decode(seat_grade,'R',1,0)) TOTAL_C ,SUM(decode(seat_grade,'S',seat_price,0))+sum(decode(seat_grade,'R',seat_price,0)) TOTAL_P FROM tb_book B, tb_show S WHERE B.show_id = S.show_id GROUP BY show_genre
SELECT show_place ,count(*) TOTAL_C ,SUM(decode(seat_grade,'S',seat_price,'R',seat_price,0)) TOTAL_P FROM tb_book B, tb_show S WHERE B.show_id = S.show_id GROUP BY show_place
SELECT book_id ,member_id ,show_name ,book_date ,payment_date ,seat_grade ,seat_num ,seat_price ,show_place ,status FROM tb_book B, tb_show S WHERE B.show_id = S.show_id

SELECT I.attraction_no ,attraction_photo ,attraction_title ,attraction_content ,attraction_tel ,attraction_category1 ,attraction_category2 ,attraction_area1 ,attraction_area2 ,attraction_area3 ,attraction_addr ,attraction_latitude ,attraction_longitude FROM tb_attraction W, tb_attraction_img I WHERE I.attraction_no = W.attraction_no ORDER BY I.attraction_no

SELECT I.attraction_no ,attraction_photo ,attraction_title ,attraction_content ,attraction_tel ,attraction_category1 ,attraction_category2 ,attraction_area1 ,attraction_area2 ,attraction_area3 ,attraction_addr ,attraction_latitude ,attraction_longitude FROM tb_attraction W, tb_attraction_img I WHERE I.attraction_no = W.attraction_no AND I.attraction_no = #{attraction_no }

SELECT SUM(decode(seat_grade,'S',seat_price,0))+sum(decode(seat_grade,'R',seat_price,0)) total FROM tb_book WHERE status = 'Y' AND TO_CHAR(payment_date, 'YYYY/MM/DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-1, 'YYYY/MM/DD') GROUP BY to_char(payment_date, 'YYYY/MM/DD')

SELECT SUM(decode(seat_grade,'S',seat_price,0))+sum(decode(seat_grade,'R',seat_price,0)) total FROM tb_book WHERE status = 'Y' AND TO_CHAR(payment_date, 'YYYY') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') GROUP BY to_char(payment_date, 'YYYY')

SELECT to_char(payment_date, 'MM/DD') payment_date ,SUM(decode(seat_grade,'S',seat_price,0))+sum(decode(seat_grade,'R',seat_price,0)) TOTAL_M FROM tb_book WHERE status = 'Y' GROUP BY to_char(payment_date, 'MM/DD')
